title: Welcome to Learn Next
subtitle: Build modern web applications with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS

seo.title: Learn Next - Build Modern Web Applications with Hmong Culture
seo.description: Discover the power of Next.js with Hmong cultural integration. Learn about Hmong traditions, New Year celebrations, farming, weddings, and village life. Build modern web apps while preserving cultural heritage.
seo.keywords: Next.js, Hmong culture, Hmong New Year, web development, React, Tailwind CSS, Hmong traditions, Hmong wedding, Hmong farming, Noj Peb Caug

og.title: Learn Next - Hmong Culture & Modern Web Development
og.description: Explore Hmong culture and learn modern web development with Next.js. Features Hmong New Year celebrations, traditional farming, wedding ceremonies, and village life.

modern.title: Modern
modern.description: Built with the latest React features and best practices

easy.title: Easy
easy.description: Simple file-based routing and intuitive API

education.title: New Learning
education.description: Learning is the process of acquiring knowledge, skills, values, and perspectives from others. This information is extended through learning, teaching, and research.

objectives.title: Educational Objectives
objectives.item2: To create good people and intellectuals in society
objectives.item3: Develop the economy and the country

benefits.title: Benefits of Education
benefits.item3: Improve quality of life, create an understanding and communicative society

ai.title: Approaches to Using AI (Artificial Intelligence)
ai.description: Creating machines or software that can think, learn, make decisions, and work like humans. Examples: ChatGPT, Siri, Google Assistant, YouTube recommendation systems, Facebook, TikTok
ai.importance1: Set clear goals: For example, use AI to help write, translate, plan
ai.importance2: Provide specific commands: For example: 'Write a 500-word essay about education'
ai.importance3: Test and improve: Check the results and improve the commands
ai.importance4: Verify accuracy: Sometimes AI can be wrong
